sentences.english: Some say love it is a razor , that leaves your soul to bleed.
sentences.chinese: 有人说爱情是一条河，会把柔嫩的芦苇淹没。

sentences.english: Wake me up with your lips .
sentences.chinese: 以你的柔嫩的双唇吻醒我吧。

sentences.english: For super-soft skin, lather on a light body lotion before you bathe.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤极柔嫩者，可在沐浴前涂上温和的护肤露。

sentences.english: Eimeria tenella hybridization F2 strain oocysts were attenuated by chemical preparation.
sentences.chinese: 采用化学致弱剂致弱柔嫩艾美耳球虫杂交F2株卵囊。

sentences.english: It moist, nourishes, renews and replenishes our skin cells, makes our skins beccoming more delicates and soft.
sentences.chinese: 保湿滋润，更新及修护皮肤细胞，让肌肤蜂细致柔嫩。

sentences.english: Shroudthem, embalm them, cover themallover with tender pride.
sentences.chinese: 套罩，涂香油，替他们盖上柔嫩的自尊。

sentences.english: Should have a well furred tail with the appearance of a waving plume.
sentences.chinese: 应当具有一个波浪状羽毛一样，至极柔嫩的尾巴。

sentences.english: Her fifteen-year-old body was so soft…
sentences.chinese: 十五岁少女的胸膛是那么地柔嫩。

sentences.english: The aim was to identify Eimeria tenella Xining strain.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定鸡柔嫩艾美耳球虫西宁株。

sentences.english: And it moisturizes like crazy, leaving lips soft and supple.
sentences.chinese: 它超滋润，让嘴唇柔嫩细致。

sentences.english: Under the banyan tree you were milking the cow with your hands, tender and fresh as butter.
sentences.chinese: 在榕树下你用乳油般柔嫩的手挤着牛奶。

sentences.english: Vacillation is the cause of his failure.
sentences.chinese: 柔嫩寡断是他失败的原因。

sentences.english: Freshly molted with new still tender and flexible .
sentences.chinese: 刚蜕皮的，新壳还比较柔嫩。

sentences.english: Light dusty-peach shade with a soft glow.
sentences.chinese: 浅蜜桃色带有柔嫩的光泽。

sentences.english: The first time use, skin becomes tender bouncy , the feeling is cozier.
sentences.chinese: 初次使用，肌肤变得柔嫩有弹性，感觉更舒适。

sentences.english: Each hair has an oily coating to make it soft and shiny.
sentences.chinese: 每一根毛发都有一层油质的外套使毛发柔嫩和闪亮。

definition: Fengrun district of Tangshan city 唐山市[Tang2 shan1 shi4], Hebei
